title: Bear & Son 16003 Fine Diamond Sharpening Hone
features: We do everything in-house from building our own blanking dies to heat treating, grinding and assembly, and hand finishing our products
Bear & Son products contain only quality USA blade steels (except Sandvik made in Sweden)
description: The Bear & Son Cutlery factory is unique. It is full self-contained. All materials and processes are completed in-house in the USA.

Perfect for upgrading your sharpening system or replacing used stones. Our accessory hones can be used with all Gatco sharpening systems. All Gatco sharpening hones have an integral guide rod holder with easy-out for use, easy in for storage sliding guide rod. Ergonomically designed hones with longer, wider stones than competitive models sharpen dull edges quickly, while safety rails protect finger tips. Gatco diamond technology solves the most difficult industrial, commercial, and D-I-Y sharpening, deburring, and stock removal challenges. Only the highest quality monocrystalline diamonds are selected for Gatco diamond products to meet rigid industry standards. Interrupted diamond pattern enhances sharpening capabilty and creates a slurry for diamond and steel particles. With its simple design and fast cutting crystals, our coarse mesh stone will sharpen your dullest blades quickly.
